title: Handle the Return of a Gift
description: A person received an item as a gift and wants to return it, but they are not the original purchaser.

tasks.description: Find the original order using information from the gift receipt or the purchaser's name/email.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully locates the original transaction.

tasks.description: Explain that, per policy, refunds can only be issued to the original payment method, but a store credit can be issued to the gift recipient.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the return policy for gifts.

tasks.description: Issue a store credit to the gift recipient's account for the value of the returned item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates and applies the store credit.
